extensionAttribute.description: A script to determine the value of Property List key. If the key is not found, "Does not exist" will be returned. key="Microsoft Defender Pilot"
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh ############################################################### # A script to determine the value of Property List key. # # If the key is not found, "Does not exist" will be returned. # ###############################################################
filepath="/Library/Preferences/org.churchofjesuschrist.ics.cts.csp.plist" key="Microsoft Defender Pilot" # Name of the "key" for which the value will be read value=$( /usr/bin/defaults read "${filepath}" "${key}" 2>&1 )
case "${value}" in *"does not exist" ) RESULT="Does not exist" ;; * ) RESULT="${value}" ;; esac
/bin/echo "<result>${RESULT}</result>"
exit 0
